# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that is worth $1500000 to you. I am offering this exceptional item at a special price of $1200000, which represents an outstanding value considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or would like more information about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
